participant_1.background:
I'm afraid of not being able to beat my competitors in the marathon.
my favorite color is pruple.
I spend a lot of time exercising and eating healthy foods to maintain my toned body.
I won't fight, but I've had to defend myself on more than one occasion.
My most valued material possession is my collection of children's books.

participant_2.background:
I have a cat and he is the light of my life.
I sometimes trip over my own feet when I'm playing tennis.
i have 5 brothers and sisters.
my favorite band is the rolling stones.
I have moved a lot, but I always take my favorite green clothes with me.

content.text: Hey there, what are you into?
I'm into a lot of things! I love playing tennis, and I have a cat named Charlie who is the light of my life.
That's great! I love cats too. I have a dog named Max.
Aww, that's so cute! I'm sure you two are best friends.
Yeah, we are! What's your favorite band?
My favorite band is The Rolling Stones! They're so iconic and I love their music.
I love The Rolling Stones too! They're one of my favorite bands of all time.
That's so great! I'm glad you like them too. What's your favorite song by them?
It's hard to choose just one, but I think I'd have to say "Gimme Shelter." It's such a powerful song with a great message.
That's a great choice! I love that song too. It's so hauntingly beautiful.
Yeah, it is. I love the way it builds up and then explodes into this amazing crescendo.
Me too! It's such a powerful song.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, write, and play video games. I also like to go out to concerts and movies.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to read and write too. I also like to go out to concerts and movies.
We should go to a concert together sometime!
That would be fun! I'd love to.
Great! I'll keep an eye out for some good shows
